00028 template < typename T >
00029 class tlm_nonblocking_get_port :
00030 public sc_core::sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >
00031 {
00032 public:
00033   typedef tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T> get_if_type;
00034 
00035   tlm_nonblocking_get_port( const char *port_name ) :
00036     sc_core::sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >( port_name ) {}
00037 
00038   sc_core::sc_event_finder& ok_to_get() const {
00039 
00040     return *new tlm_event_finder_t< get_if_type , T >(
00041        *this,
00042        &get_if_type::ok_to_get );
00043 
00044   }
00045 
00046 };
